name: Crochet Bunny
description: A cute, handmade crochet bunny made with soft yarn. Perfect for gifts and nursery decor.

name: Soft Crochet Blanket
description: A soft and warm crochet blanket, perfect for cozying up on the couch or adding a handmade touch to your bed. Made with 100% cotton yarn for comfort and durability.

name: Winter Cozy Hat
description: Stay warm and stylish with this cozy crochet hat. Available in various sizes and colors.

name: Crochet Sweater
description: A cozy handmade crochet sweater, perfect for staying warm and stylish. Great for layering in cooler weather.

name: Handmade Crochet Pillow
description: Soft and decorative crochet pillow for your home. Available in different colors and designs.

name: Crochet Coffee Cup Cozy
description: Keep your hands cool with this eco-friendly crochet coffee cup cozy. Fits most standard cup sizes.

name: Crochet Baby Booties
description: Cute and comfy crochet baby booties, perfect for your little one. Soft, stretchy, and gentle on baby's feet.

name: Crochet Keychain
description: Handmade crochet keychain. Add a touch of personality to your keys, bags, or as a gift.

name: Crochet Plant Pot Cover
description: A stylish crochet cover for your plant pots. Adds charm and protection to your plants while decorating your space.

name: Crochet Handbag
description: Stylish and eco-friendly crochet handbag, perfect for carrying your essentials with a touch of handmade charm.

name: Crochet Scarf
description: Warm and cozy crochet scarf, perfect for colder weather. (Wooden house shown in image not included.)

name: Crochet Tote Bag
description: Handmade crochet tote bag. A stylish and functional accessory for everyday use, shopping, or travel.

name: Crochet Christmas Stocking
description: Add a handmade touch to your holiday decorations with this crochet Christmas stocking. Perfect for filling with gifts.

name: Crochet Baby Blanket
description: A soft and warm crochet baby blanket, perfect for newborns. Made with hypoallergenic materials.

name: Crochet Phone Case
description: Protect your phone with this cute crochet phone case. Handmade with care and available in various sizes.
